article:
Chris's parents were proud of him when he graduated from college.But after six months, he still didn't find a job.In fact, he had no idea _ he wanted to do.He was living at home with his parents and things were becoming not good.His father thought of _ as a lazy man who was afraid to enter the real world.
Chris thought his dad was unreasonable .After all, he was young and he needed some space.During a recent argument, Chris said, "I'm not you, Dad.I have my own way _ doing things.I want a job I enjoy." His dad said, "That's a nice idea, _ anyway we call.it 'job'  because it's about making a living, not having fun."
There are many young people like Chris.They are having trouble getting started with a serious job and becoming _ They just don't want to grow up.They think when the time is right, everything will be all right.
 _ , it doesn't work that way.Things happen and opportunities appear most often when we are moving, not standing still .The _ step is the hardest, but the key to _ in anything is getting started.
